name: My Damn Source
subtitle: A source for all of my damn apps
description: Welcome to my damn source! Here you'll find all of my damn apps.

apps.name: VN
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: This is an awesome app only available on AltStore.

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: This allows you to record video.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This identifier will be used to deliver personalized ads to you.
privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: This allows you to edit your video with your own music.
privacy.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: This allows you to recognize your voice.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This allows you to record your voice.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This allows you to share your location with your posts or videos.
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Videos will be tagged with the location where they were taken.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This allows you to share videos from your library and save videos to your camera roll.
